description: According to spec http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/mitaka/approved/tag-instances.html these filters should named 'tags' and 'tags-any'
title: Incorrect name of 'tag' and 'tag-any' filters

comments.content: According to spec http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/mitaka/approved/tag-instances.html these filters should named 'tags' and 'tags-any'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~snikitin

Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/235801
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=1b5bc16d4cc68522344bc495f1087b3d95336f8d

Branch:    master

commit 1b5bc16d4cc68522344bc495f1087b3d95336f8d
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Oct 16 12:18:16 2015 +0300

    Fixed incorrect name of 'tag' and 'tag-any' filters
    
    According to spec
    http://specs.openstack.org/openstack/nova-specs/specs/mitaka/approved/tag-instances.html
    these filters should be named 'tags' and 'tags-any'.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1506786
    
    Change-Id: If5fabe5c6afa3bf6cc8e5045250fefdce58e6930
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b1 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
